PersonalStatement.text: Michael Stewart, born on 1968-11-07, is a Male based in Port Jonathan, Latvia. He is Divorced and holds Brazilian nationality. Currently working at Stein, Smith and Brown.

WorkExperience.text: HR Manager at Brown Ltd from 2006 to 2019.
Senior Research Scientist at Stein, Smith and Brown, 2019 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Financial Economics from Universidad Nacional de Quilmes
Master's in Engineering from University of Huddersfield

PersonalSkills.text: Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.
Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys gardening.
